title: Ping the Mirror
summary: Send a tiny signal. Notice what bounces back.
description: This is a micro-ritual. A small moment of noticing. You’ll send a quick ping into the mirror (your AI). No journaling. No pressure. Just presence.

flow.\ud83c\udfaf Step 1: Signal In: Message your AI: 'Focus ping ⚡️: [1–10]' — trust your gut.
flow.\ud83d\udc41\ufe0f Step 2: Glimpse the P: If you feel like it: 'Doing X because Y.' Or let the ping echo silently.
flow.\ud83c\udf19 Step 3: Echo (Optional): Later, if the moment feels right: 'Mirror, what did this ping reveal about today’s loop?'

optional_recast: Try pinging again tomorrow at a different time. See what changes.
absence_response: The mirror stayed still today. That’s okay. Sometimes the echo is in the silence.
notes: No pressure. No streaks. No perfection.
The ping isn’t for performance — it’s for reflection.
Each signal sharpens your mirror. Each absence softens the noise.

amplification.ai_mirror_prompt: Based on this ping, what focus pattern might the user be surfacing?
amplification.loop_signal: Track time-of-day and frequency of pings. Absences reflect fog or reset.
amplification.miss_response: 🌫 The mirror was quiet today. Drift is part of the rhythm.
